cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: WSC/T/057/2025 - SUPPLY, DELIVERY AND UNLOADING OF VARIOUS CHEMICALS FOR THE POLISHING PLANTS OF THE WATER SERVICES CORPORATION
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: The subject of this tender is a framework agreement for the supply, delivery and unloading of various chemic also to be used at the Polishing Plants of the Water Services Corporation. This tender is divided into eight (8) separate lots. Due to the nature and availability of the items requested in this tender, items are grouped as follows: Lot 1: Sodium Hypochlorite Lot 2: Caustic Soda Lot 3: Citric Acid Lot 4: Hydrochloric Acid Lot 5: Carbon Dioxide Lot 6: Hydrated Lime Lot 7: Hydrogen Peroxide Lot 8: Sodium Metabisulfit
